body:
Hello,

I am trying to run spack on our HPC system for the first time. When I execute setup-env.sh, the script is unable to identify the platform for our machine - with below error message.

spack.architecture.NoPlatformError: Could not determine a platform for this machine.

We have XC40 system running SLES SP12 SP3 with Aries network and Haswell processors.

user@cluster:~/spack/share/spack> uname -a
Linux cluster 4.4.103-6.38_4.0.95-cray_ari_s #1 SMP Fri Feb 9 17:58:18 UTC 2018 (4.0.95) x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

Any clues on addressing this issue?

Thanks.
title: Unrecognized platform for cray xc40
